forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
